==Future developments==
  â
''Reconstructor 3'' seems to be already in development <ref>[http://reconstructor.aperantis.com/index.php?option=com_joomlaboard&Itemid=44&func=view&id=1043&catid=5 "Working on Reconstructor 3..."]</ref>. Planned features include [[Chrooted X]] (allowing easier customization of some things) and the ability to create a [[Live USB]]<ref>http://reconstructor.wiki.sourceforge.net/V3+Design</ref>.
